name: Saag Aloo Mattar
recipeInstructions: Wash and chop the potatoes into bite-sized pieces.
In a large pan, heat ghee over medium heat.
Add cumin powder, turmeric powder, and sauté until fragrant.
Add spinach leaves, kidney beans, salt, and stir well.
Add the chopped potatoes and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until they are cooked through.
Garnish with paneer cubes (if using) and fresh cilantro.
Serve hot with naan or rice.
description: A classic Punjabi dish made with spinach, kidney beans, potatoes, and paneer, all simmered in a flavorful tomato-based sauce. This hearty and comforting recipe is a staple of North Indian cuisine.
image: A photo of the finished Saag Aloo Mattar with a dollop of ghee on top.
